content:
Dear all,

Artificial intelligence has the potential to make a decisive contribution to overcoming the major challenges facing society. Success and acceptance depend largely on how responsibly AI is developed and applied.
With the European digital conference "TRUSTinAI - Responsible AI for Science and Societyâ€œ AI experts and AI interested parties from science, industry, politic and society will network and discuss central questions of AI. The focus is on trustworthy AI as a driver of innovation for companies, as an object and tool for science and as a competitive factor for Europe and its partners.

Register and join the discussion on Novemeber 26, 2020! https://trustinai.dfki.de/

Trust in AI Conference 2020
TRUSTinAI - Responsible AI for Science and Society - International Conference on Artificial Intelligence within the framework of the German EU Council Presidency.
